page.title: 11LEISURE ACTIVITIES NASH AREA
page.content: Nash and its surrounding area has its share of keep fit enthusiasts who go to leisure centres nearby for swimming, badminton, squash, etc. Many residents prefer to take a lighter form of exercise and at the same time enjoy this beautiful countryside by jogging, walking the footpaths, riding the bridleways or simply gardening. The other activities in which residents are involved include a local cricket team for both sexes, a netball team, amateur dramatics, dancing and musical interests. Water sports such as wind surfing and sailing are becoming popular as the old gravel pits are landscaped. Hobbies are wide and varied and include bell-ringing and the ancient craft of lacemaking.
